title: Field Trial Programme Data Package
description: Field Trial Programme Data Package is a specification for detailing the plots within a field trial programme.

profile.context: Every Package and Resource descriptor has a profile. The default profile, if none is declared, is `data-package` for Package and `data-resource` for Resource.
